pages.text: Wa Al-Baladu At-Tayyibu Yakhruju Nabatuhu Bi'idhni Rabbihi Wa Al-Ladhi Khabutha La Yakhruju 'Illa Nakidaan Kadhalika Nusarrifu Al-'Ayati Liqawmin Yashkuruna
Laqad 'Arsalna Nuhaan 'Ila Qawmihi Faqala Ya Qawmi A`budu Allaha Ma Lakum Min 'Ilahin Ghayruhu 'Inni 'Akhafu `Alaykum `Adhaba Yawmin `Azimin
Qala Al-Mala'u Min Qawmihi 'Inna Lanaraka Fi Đalalin Mubinin
Qala Ya Qawmi Laysa Bi Đalalatun Wa Lakinni Rasulun Min Rabbi Al-`Alamina
Uballighukum Risalati Rabbi Wa 'Ansahu Lakum Wa 'A`lamu Mina Allahi Ma La Ta`lamuna
Awa`ajibtum 'An Ja'akum Dhikrun Min Rabbikum `Ala Rajulin Minkum Liyundhirakum Wa Litattaqu Wa La`allakum Turhamuna
Fakadhabuhu Fa'anjaynahu Wa Al-Ladhina Ma`ahu Fi Al-Fulki Wa 'Aghraqna Al-Ladhina Kadhabu Bi'ayatina 'Innahum Kanu Qawmaan `Amina
Wa 'Ila `Adin 'Akhahum Hudaan Qala Ya Qawmi A`budu Allaha Ma Lakum Min 'Ilahin Ghayruhu 'Afala Tattaquna
Qala Al-Mala'u Al-Ladhina Kafaru Min Qawmihi 'Inna Lanaraka Fi Safahatin Wa 'Inna Lanazunnuka Mina Al-Kadhibina
Qala Ya Qawmi Laysa Bi Safahatun Wa Lakinni Rasulun Min Rabbi Al-`Alamina
